mapper.select: SELECT TX_ID AS txId, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, INOUT_DATETIME AS inoutDatetime, INOUT_GUBUN AS inoutGubun, TASK_GUBUN AS taskGubun, AUTH_EMP_NO AS authEmpNo FROM ATMS_04001200

SELECT TX_ID AS txId, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, INOUT_DATETIME AS inoutDatetime, INOUT_GUBUN AS inoutGubun, TASK_GUBUN AS taskGubun, AUTH_EMP_NO AS authEmpNo FROM ATMS_04001200 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, INOUT_DATETIME = #{inoutDatetime}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_04001200 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, INOUT_DATETIME = #{inoutDatetime}

UPDATE ATMS_04001200 SET TX_ID = #{txId}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, CORP_CODE = #{corpCode}, INOUT_GUBUN = #{inoutGubun}, TASK_GUBUN = #{taskGubun}, AUTH_EMP_NO = #{authEmpNo} WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, INOUT_DATETIME = #{inoutDatetime}

INSERT INTO ATMS_04001200 ( TX_ID, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, CORP_CODE, INOUT_DATETIME, INOUT_GUBUN, TASK_GUBUN, AUTH_EMP_NO ) VALUES ( #{txId}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{corpCode}, #{inoutDatetime}, #{inoutGubun}, #{taskGubun}, #{authEmpNo} )
